alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Niagara; Northern Erie; Orleans; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 24 at 9:12PM EST until December 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Life threatening blizzard conditions and heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet in the most persistent bands. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Wind chills as cold as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Niagara, Orleans, Erie, and Genesee counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be impossible in the hardest hit areas. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility to zero. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Strong winds will cause significant blowing and drifting snow, frequently reducing visibilities to zero. Travel is strongly discouraged.

area.areaDesc: Genesee; Niagara; Northern Erie; Orleans; Southern Erie
